ai-patthana21.17:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.17:1.1_0: No to cause the pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana21.17:1.1_1: No to cause a condition for the pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana21.17:1.1_2: doesn’t arise because of pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana21.17:2.1_0: He doesn’t look to the three kinds of painful feeling.
ai-patthana21.17:3.1_0: Nor do they give rise to neutral feeling ...
